opendial.domains.rules.parameters

Interface Parameter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComplexParameter, FixedParameter, SingleParameter

    public interface Parameter
    Interface for a parameter associated with an effect

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MathExpression getExpression()
      Returns the mathematical expression representing the parameter
      double getValue(Assignment input)
      Returns the actual parameter value given the inputs provided as arguments.
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getVariables()
      Returns the (possibly empty) set of parameter identifiers used in the parameter object.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        double getValue(Assignment input)
        Returns the actual parameter value given the inputs provided as arguments. If the actual value cannot be retrieved (missing information), throws an exception.
        Parameters:
        input - the input assignment
        Returns:
        the actual parameter value

      • getVariables

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getVariables()
        Returns the (possibly empty) set of parameter identifiers used in the parameter object.
        Returns:
        the collection of parameter labels

      • getExpression

        MathExpression getExpression()
        Returns the mathematical expression representing the parameter
        Returns:
        the expression
